ncrsdatagroup.abcd:ProjectTitle: Collecting trip to the Azores in 1979

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: AZO.031: Azores, Faial, S coast, Horta, just W of Porto Pim; 38°31'N 28°38'W; rocky shore with stones, boulders and sand, depth to 3 m; shore-coll. & snorkeling; 9.x.1979
Kruijt: Saudi Arabia, Red Sea, Jiddah

Sta. Cur82.007 Netherlands Antilles, Curacao, Piscadera Inner Bay, northern part, near Isla Rafael. 5.viii.1982. Depth 0.3-0.5 m. On stones and shells. Stones on mud, with Thalassia, algae and hydroids.
5.093: CANCAP-V, Sta. 5.093: Azores, E of Faial; 38°34'N 28°34'W; depth 92 m, volcanic sand with shell gravel; van Veen grab; 2.vi.1981
2.114: CANCAP-II, Sta. 2.114: Canary Islands, SW of Hierro, off Punta de Orchilla; 27°41'N 18°09'W; depth 340-480 m; van Veen grab; 4.ix.1977
3.070: CANCAP-III, Sta. 3.070: Selvagens archipelago, SW of Selvagem Grande; 30°07'N 15°54'W; depth 645 m, fine sand; van Veen grab; 21.x.1978
5.150: CANCAP-V, Sta. 5.150: Azores, E of Flores; 39°25'N 31°06'W; depth 200 m, coarse calcareous sand with shell gravel; van Veen grab; 9.vi.1981
